questions.explanation: Chad's flag is almost identical to Romania's, but with a slightly darker shade of blue.
Nepal is the only country with a non-rectangular flag.

questions.text: This flag belongs to which island nation?
questions.explanation: Seychelles features five oblique bands radiating from the bottom left.

questions.text: Which country has a dragon on its flag?
questions.explanation: The Thunder Dragon (Druk) appears on the flag of Bhutan. (Wales also has one, but this is a sovereign nation quiz).

questions.text: Distinguish this flag from similar ones:
questions.explanation: Indonesia is Red over White. Poland is White over Red. Monaco is Red over White (but different dimensions).

questions.text: Which country's flag features an AK-47?
questions.explanation: Mozambique is the only national flag to feature a modern assault rifle.

questions.text: Identify the flag of this Nordic country:
questions.explanation: Iceland's flag is blue with a red cross outlined in white.

questions.text: Which flag has a maple leaf?
questions.explanation: The Maple Leaf flag has been Canada's national flag since 1965.

questions.text: This flag features a cedar tree:
questions.explanation: The Lebanon Cedar is the national emblem of Lebanon.

questions.text: Identify this flag with a sun and eagle:
questions.explanation: Kazakhstan's flag is sky blue with a gold sun and steppe eagle.
